[b][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums Privacy Change[/color][/b]
In light of [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999F1]Omniscient's[/color][/b][/url] recent announcement:

[list]
[*][b]What is GDPR?[/b] - The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a legal framework that sets guidelines for the collection and processing of personal information of individuals within the European Union (EU). [size=xx-small][url=https://www.investopedia.com/terms/g/general-data-protection-regulation-gdpr.asp]>>source[/url][/size]
[/list]

[list]
[*][b]GDPR Overview[/b] - The aim of the GDPR is to protect all EU citizens from privacy and data breaches in an increasingly data-driven world that is vastly different from the time in which the 1995 directive was established. Although the key principles of data privacy still hold true to the previous directive, many changes have been proposed to the regulatory policies. [size=xx-small][url=https://www.eugdpr.org/key-changes.html]>>source[/url][/size]
[/list]
It is still unclear as to what exact changes will be coming and how it will effect community members; however, you can follow the discussion here: https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5835124
[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5835124]>>see thread[/url][/size]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Conspiracy Theorists and Being Paranoid do not go Hand in Hand[/color][/b] 
Johannes Gutenberg of the University of Mainz released the results of his look into the relationship of paranoia and conspiracy. The research into the human psyche revealed that while paranoid people believe everyone is against and out to get them, conspiracy theorists more often believe that there are an extremely small and powerful group of people out for them. Another researcher on the team summarized their findings extremely well with “I think our findings are best encapsulated in the notion that while there is a certain overlap of subclinical paranoia and conspiracy beliefs, the two markedly differ in their scope of both the threat and the target: Whereas paranoid people believe that virtually everyone is after specifically them, conspiracy believer think that a few powerful people are after virtually everyone,” This is certainly a step forward in understanding the infinite intricacies of the mind. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.psypost.org/2018/05/study-conspiracy-theorists-not-necessarily-paranoid-51216]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cannibis is far From the Perfect Drug[/color][/b] 
Newly conducted research at the University of Buffalo in New York sheds new light on the effects of prenatal use. It had previously been common knowledge that consumption during pregnancy would lead to underweight births, but Rina Das Eiden and her team wanted to go further. The team found that babies exposed to the drug in the third trimester were more likely to be born underweight, which we had already known, and they tended to be birthed earlier than their drug-free counterparts. According to Dr. Eiden they also observed “We also found that lower birth weight and size predicted a baby’s behavior in later infancy,” Eiden says. “Babies who were smaller were reported by their mothers to be more irritable, more easily frustrated and had greater difficulty calming themselves when frustrated. Thus, there was an indirect association between co-exposure to tobacco and marijuana and infant behavior via poor growth at delivery.” I certainly hope studies such as this are ramped up as the number of places with legal consumption increases. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.buffalo.edu/news/releases/2018/05/016.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/lv4d7BY.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]Tesla’s giant battery in Australia reduced grid service cost by 90%[/color][/b] 
Tesla’s giant battery, “Powerpack” has been successfully operating for nearly 6 months in Australia. A recent report provides details on just how impactful it has been on the local energy market. One major statistic provided was that of the cost of the grid service, which has reduced costs by 90%. Prior to this development, when a power-related issue occurs, a team of experienced members of the frequency control and ancillary services (FCAS) called upon. The calling and operation consists mostly of “large and costly gas generators and steam turbines kicking in to compensate for the loss of power.” During the period that this service is needed, electricity rates can total near $14,000 per MW. The Tesla-developed Powerpack provides a service equivalent, but for cheaper rates, along with quicker times and zero-emissions. Within just a few days during January, it is said to have made over $1 million, though Tesla claims they are not receiving funds properly, given the payment system does not account for the swift charging power provided to the grid. In total, South Australia has seen savings totaled at just over $30 million in merely a few months of uptime. Tesla is done, however, seeing that they intend to open an even larger “energy storage project in Australia after securing $25 million in funding,” along with opening a “50,000-home virtual power plant with Powerwalls in Australia.” [i][size=x-small][url=https://electrek.co/2018/05/11/tesla-giant-battery-australia-reduced-grid-service-cost]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Canada sued over years of alleged experimentation on indigenous people[/color][/b] 
On 11 May 2018, a “class action lawsuit has been filed in a Canadian court on behalf of the thousands of indigenous people alleged to have been unwittingly subjected to medical experiments without their consent.” A group of the population in Saskatchewan have filed a suit that holds Canada’s federal government accountable for medical experiments allegedly executed in residential schools and reserves within a timeframe ranging from the 1930s to 1950s. Additionally in the suit, an allegation of long discriminating and ‘inadequate medical care’ provided at Indian hospitals and sanatoriums, which are quintessential elements to the healthcare system that was in operation across the country, starting in 1945 and ending in the early 1980s. Tony Merchant, the head of the firm representing this case provided the comment, ‘This strikes me as so atrocious that there ought to be punitive and exemplary damages awarded, in addition to compensation.’ In the lawsuit’s text, it states that more than 150,000 aboriginal children were forced to comply and tried to “assimilate them into Canadian society,” where they were used for nutritional experiments, so that researchers could test their theories about vitamins and certain foods. The report states, given the children lacked fundamental nutrition in school, the kids that were tested on were ‘ideal experimental subjects.’  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theguardian.com/world/2018/may/11/canada-indigenous-people-medical-experiments-lawsuit]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]President Trump says his summit with North Korea leader Kim Jong Un will be held on June 12 in Singapore[/color][/b] 
After long speculation, President Trump has officially confirmed that a summit with North Korean dictator Kim Jong-Un would be held. The summit will take place on 12 June in Singapore. Marking history, it will be the first time that a United States president and North Korean leader have a sit-down. Just less than a year after being on the brink of war, the two countries have cooperated in efforts to provide a new step for world peace. Per President Trumps Twitter, “The highly anticipated meeting between Kim Jong Un and myself will take place in Singapore on June 12th. We will both try to make it a very special moment for World Peace!” A meeting between the two seemed unlikely to many critics, given the past scenarios, however, history will be made shortly. Just before the official announcement was made, President Trump welcomed home three Americans who had been held captive by North Korea. The country released them as an act of good faith to Secretary of State Mike Pompeo.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.cnbc.com/2018/05/10/president-trump-kim-jong-un-summit-to-be-held-on-june-12-in-singapore.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/uVQrGNh.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Thanos Has Been Hit With More Buffs and Nerfs in Fortnite[/color][/b] 
Some of us are very happy that Fornite has done this collaboration with Marvel to bring Thanos into the game. However, some are actually against it and hate the trend. The meme that Thanos and the new Avengers movie has brought forth can be a little annoying after a while, but what can you do. If you are not up to date with Fortnite news, whether it be to take a break for finals, or simply you gave up on the game, Thanos was introduced in a new solo game mode. Players would have the chance to become Thanos for a limited about of time. The time being until they were killed by other players. You start out as you normally would in the battle bus and drop out. The goal is to kill the current Thanos, or if you are  Thanos, eliminate everyone until you are the last man alive. People felt like Thanos was too overpowered from the start. With that being said, Epic Games made some edits to him. The edits they took upon changes were made so that you felt strong as Thanos, but those who were opposing against you did not feel like you were an unstoppable force that could not be reckoned with. Therefore, Thanos' beam was increased from 12 to 20 damage onto players. In addition, punch damage from 80 to 100 and your health was decreased from 800 to 500. Some good general changes included the increased rate of medkits and shields, rare, epic, and legendary weapons.
[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/thanos-has-been-hit-with-more-buffs-and-nerfs-in-fortnite/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Crash Bandicoot Remaster Releasing On Switch, Xbox One, And PC Early[/color][/b] 
Crash Bandicoot is definitely one of the most popular games from the past that almost everyone had the chance to play. A remastered version of the game is coming soon on Switch, Xbox One, and PC. The original plan of the game was to be released on June 10. Sadly, the release date of the game was changed to June 29. It is a little bit of extra waiting time, but come on; we are getting an awesome remastered game. Waiting should not be a problem as we will want this to be as best as they can produce. Purchasing the remastered edition of the game brings forth updated versions of Crash Bandicoot, Cortex Strikes Back, and Warped. The PS4 version of the remastered edition was released back in 2017. The sales of the game were very successful and Sony state that the release of this was one of the most top selling remastered video game sold. It may be surprising that a Sony exclusive game is coming to other consoles, but let us not jinx it. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/crash-bandicoot-remaster-releasing-on-switch-xbox-/1100-6458859/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]You Can Start Earning Minecraft Xbox Achievements On Switch In June[/color][/b] 
Do not be that one kid that says, "Do people still play this game?" Yes, they do. Minecraft for the Switch has not been the most talked about the game since the release of the game and the cool Mario inspired skins released specifically for the Switch. That does not mean it has been forgotten. Although there is not much to talk about it considering it probably will not be as great as the PC version, there are still some things to look forward to like the introduction of achievements. Coming this June, Minecraft on the Switch will introduce the achievement system that those who are familiar with already know of. Some good news, though, was the implementation of the cross-platform system where players on the Switch can play with Xbox players. This is good, but Nintendo will be releasing their very own online service that you will need to pay for in order to play online multiplayer games. This service will be similar to PS Plus and Xbox Live. The price has been listed at $20 per year. Not too bad considering the competitors are definitely a lot more. The update has not been released yet for the Switch, but when it does, it will be free. You should expect the online service to be implemented too upon the release of this update. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/you-can-start-earning-minecraft-xbox-achievements-/1100-6458888/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Pokemon Go News![/color][/b] 
Sadly, this is another game most have forgotten about. The game is still popular. It may not be as popular on HF, but around the world, millions of people are still playing it. Do not stick to that little bubble that HF is the only place in the world. #FactsfromTsundere. Starting with the news of what is going on now in Pokemon Go, Latios and Latias are now appearing across the world. Those in Europe and Asia will get the chance to catch Latios, while the Americas and Africa can catch Latias. The event started May 8 and will continue until June 5. If you are busy studying for finals, you still may have a chance to capture them after you are all done with the semester. The only way to obtain either Pokemon that you can capture, depending on your region, will be like all the other legendaries you capture by doing a raid battle. You will need to bring some friends or meet up with other players who are interested in the cute Eon Pokemon. Both Latios and Latias are Dragon/Psychic-types. Thus, making them vulnerable to Dark and Fairy Pokemon! Onto the next news, a summer event that fans should be looking forward to will be coming as well! Titled, "Pokemon Go Summer Tour 2018" the summer tour will be a bunch of hosted events that will be held all across the world rather than the usual United States locations. The first event will start next month in Germany and is called the "Safari Zone Event". On June 30 and July 1 at Westfalenpark in Dortmund, those in Germany will have the chance to experience a Pokemon festival event. Additionally, Japan will be getting the same event later in the summer too. Those who want to participate in the Safari Zone events can do so for free. However, those who want to visit the Pokemon Go Fest will need to purchase a $20 ticket. The Pokemon Go Fest will be in Chicago and tickets are selling out fast. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/pokemon-go-fest-safari-zone-events-returning-in-su/1100-6458748/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][sp=Gaming Video of the Week][yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HP94ROUHfRo[/yt][/sp][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/q2F6BnS.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Fate/stay night: Heaven's Feel II. lost butterfly Releases Visual and PV![/color][/b] 
The first Fate/stay night movie, Fate/stay night Movie: Heaven's Feel - I. Presage Flower, which premiered Oct. 27, 2017, recently came out on Blu-Ray. This opens up the opportunity for those who never had the chance to see a live or delayed viewing of the movie. There is even greater news for those who enjoy not only the series itself but the first movie. Another movie is in production "Fate/stay night: Heaven's Feel II. lost butterfly," and a key visual as well as a preview were released. There is no specified date on when the movie will be released, but the good news is that it will be sometime this year. That being said, the delayed viewing of the anime might not be until 2019, so people outside of Japan will have to wait. Taken from the [url=https://myanimelist.net/anime/33049/Fate_stay_night_Movie__Heavens_Feel_-_II_Lost_Butterfly]MyAnimeList[/url] page, this is the second of three movies, the third and final one being "Fate/stay night Movie: Heaven's Feel 3". The KV can be seen [url=https://i.imgur.com/nGh1xRl.jpg]here[/url], and the PV can be watched on [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fqq7oaOYr28]YouTube[/url], but there is a country restriction so you might not have the chance to see it. [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5af40681eb8ca926146825d3/Fate-stay-night-Heaven-s-Feel-II-lost-butterfly-Releases-Visual-and-PV!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]The Studio Ghibli Theme Park's Official Concept Explained[/color][/b] 
Japan will be getting a Studio Ghibli Theme Park near Nagoya, Japan. Originally supposed to be finished and ready in 2020, the theme park is now scheduled to be completed in 2022. The theme park will have a 200-hectare plot of land, which is converted to 2.471 acres or 10,000 square meters. Those who enjoyed Studio Ghibli movies will have the chance to re-live their childhood and enjoy the movie-inspired attractions. The theme park will feature a nature-like aspect to it, and each specific spot will have a theme to it, obviously. The opening area where everyone will enter the park will be inspired by Howl’s Moving Castle. The buildings will be 19-century inspired, and a recreation of the Whisper of the Heart’s antique shop will also be present. In addition, a big Big Ghibli Warehouse will be filled with a bunch of play areas for children, small movies, and much more. Princess Mononoke Village, Witch Valley that has attractions for Howl’s Moving Castle and Kiki’s Delivery Service fans, and even Dondoko Forest for Totoro fans. [i][size=x-small][url=https://kotaku.com/first-look-at-the-studio-ghibli-theme-parks-official-co-1825523519]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Darling in the Franxx Voice Actor Hospitalized With Rare Autoimmune Disease[/color][/b] 
Yuichiro Umehara, who voices the role of Goro in the anime Darling in the FranXX has recently been hospitalized with an autoimmune disease. The agency that Umehara-san works for [url=http://www.artsvision.co.jp/news/4720/]posted[/url] on their official website that he will be taking some time off to recover. No information has been brought forth regarding what will happen to his role in future episodes of Darling in the FranXX as it is still airing. On the website, the agency apologizes for any conveniences that this disease may bring to the future. The disease that Umehara-san has is "acute disseminated encephalomyelitis (ADEM)." Thankfully, as a report from the internet says those who are suffering from the disease usually recover swiftly and without any problems. The agency will make another announcement on their website if the recovery goes well or becomes worse. [i][size=x-small][url=https://kotaku.com/darling-in-the-franxx-voice-actor-hospitalized-with-rar-1825913868]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Mobile Suit Gundam Favorites Chosen in 40th Anniversary Poll![/color][/b] 
A huge celebration for the Gundam series as they are slowly creeping up to their 40th-year anniversary. The very first Gundam series aired in 1979, and since the series has been one of the most popular among the mecha genre. In celebration of the 40th year, a voting was taken from March 2 to April 20 where over 1,740,280 were counted. The votes went towards the top 10 favorite songs, characters, suits and series.

Taken from [url=https://otakumode.com]Otaku Mode[/url], the website lists these results:

Top 10 Series
[list]
[*]10. Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory (1991)
[*]9. Mobile Suit Gundam Wing (1995)
[*]8. Mobile Fighter G Gundam (1994)
[*]7. Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn (2010)
[*]6. Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans (2015)
[*]5. Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack (1988)
[*]4. Mobile Suit Gundam 00 (2007)
[*]3. Mobile Suit Gundam SEED (2002)
[*]2. Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam (1985)
[*]1. Mobile Suit Gundam (1979)
[/list]

Top 10 Mobile Suits
[list]
[*]10. Gundam ( Mobile Suit Gundam )
[*]9. Gundam F91 ( Mobile Suit Gundam F91 )
[*]8. Sazabi ( Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack )
[*]7. Qubeley ( Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam )
[*]6. Hyaku Shiki ( Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam )
[*]5. Freedom Gundam ( Mobile Suit Gundam SEED )
[*]4. Wing Gundam Zero ( Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz )
[*]3. Strike Freedom Gundam ( Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny )
[*]2. Zeta Gundam ( Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam )
[*]1. ν Gundam ( Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack )
[/list]

Top 10 Characters
[list]
[*]10. Ramba Ral ( Mobile Suit Gundam )
[*]9. Setsuna F. Seiei ( Mobile Suit Gundam 00 )
[*]8. Char Aznable ( Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack )
[*]7. Kira Yamato ( Mobile Suit Gundam SEED )
[*]6. Quattro Bajeena ( Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam )
[*]5. Amuro Ray ( Mobile Suit Gundam )
[*]4. Kamille Bidan ( Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam )
[*]3. Amuro Ray ( Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack )
[*]2. Char Aznable ( Mobile Suit Gundam )
[*]1. Olga Talvitie ( Mobile Suit Gundam: Iron-Blooded Orphans )
[/list]

The original movie was titled, "Mobile Suite Gundam" and as said before aired back in 1979. The franchise's website states that all of their series combined had over, "56 series, over 2,000 characters, 900 mechas and 200 theme songs." Sadly you cannot vote anymore, but those who were able to have the chance even if you were not from Japan. Those from outside countries had the chance to vote but were required to leave a nickname, age, and gender in the prompts that they were given. There was a limitation, however, for everyone when it came to the voting. You were only allowed to choose one favorite series, three mobile suits, five characters, and two of the songs. This voting offered a chance for fans to not only celebrate the 40th year but the upcoming new Gundam series "Secret History: Gundam Historia." [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5af008a39f15fcbb10924fd7/Mobile-Suit-Gundam-Favorites-Chosen-in-40th-Anniversary-Poll!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
